title: Generate Biotech Company Dossier Input
description: Input schema for generating a comprehensive biotech company dossier

cik.description: SEC CIK (Central Index Key), 10-digit zero-padded or numeric string

company_name.description: Company name (used if ticker/CIK not provided)

include_trials.description: Whether to include detailed clinical trials information

include_financials.description: Whether to include financial information from SEC filings

max_publications.description: Maximum number of publications to include

max_trials.description: Maximum number of trials to include in detail
